name: Replica Monodrone
languages: can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Dismantlable
entries: If the replica monodrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.
